entry.data:

A CHANCE OF SHOWERS WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
TEMPERATURE RISING INTO THE MID 60S AFTER MIDNIGHT
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH, BECOMING SOUTH 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS WITH THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY BE SEVERE WITH HEAVY RAINFALL IN THE AFTERNOON
WINDY AND NOT AS COOL
MORE HUMID WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 20 TO 30 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 45 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

SHOWERS WITH THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY IN THE EVENING, THEN A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT

LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 45 MPH, DIMINISHING TO 5 TO 10 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT
